ToDo Backup ToDo Restore
This Application allows you to create multiple list of jobs or tasks which need to be actioned. Clicking the three dot\'s display the menu. You can manage ToDo Lists using the "List Maintenance" option. The down arrow lists of all ToDo item list defined.
Click the check box in a ToDo Item to mark it as complete. All completed items are moved to the "Finished" list. Individual Items can be removed from the "FINISHED" by clicking on the item and pressing the Delete button. The menu has an option to clear the whole "FINISHED" list. You may search for specific items matching characters by entering them in the search field. This option is only available on the "FINISHED" and "ALL" lists.
You can use either the keyboard by tapping on this field or speech button to enter a description of the ToDo task in this field. Clicking the button show below will start listening for speech. While listening for speech to translate the button changes to. Using this drop down list yu can move items between your current ToDo Lists. All of the function shown below are on the + screen which can be accesses via the add button at the bottom.
You can optionally set a due date, by clicking this field. This screen will then appear, which allows you to set the due date and time. You can set the Late and/or overdue limits and colors on the settings screen.
Pressing this button allows you to add photos associated with this task. Once a picture has been taken it will be added to your ToDo list and look like. Lets Start Todo You can re-order ToDo Items in a list by taping on and holding an item until it turns gray and then dragging it to the new position in the list.
